companyInfo.name: UK DESIGNS PVT.LTD. | UK ARCHITECTS PVT.LTD. | KRATAARTH ARCHITECTS
companyInfo.heroTitle: Simplicity Is Keynote To Great Design
companyInfo.philosophy: Good design is produced from careful study and research, combined with technical knowledge and artistic judgment. Its philosophy is built on the dual concepts of client service and design excellence.

director.name: Uday Kanadia
director.title: Director
director.bio: Gold Medalist from L.S. Raheja College of Architecture. His dynamic nature and sparkling personality reflect in his work, leaving an everlasting impression on the minds of spectators. His motto is to design, detail and enjoy working in responsive to his client's need in a very honest, efficient and professional manner.

contact.address: 409, Highway commercial center, I.B.Patel Road, Laghu Udhyog, Off Western Express Highway, Goregaon (East), Mumbai-400063

projects.title: Sky Walks
projects.location: Bhandup, Mulund, Badlapur, Vidhyavihar, Thane, Kurla & Ullashnagar
projects.description: Public pedestrian walkways for MMRDA ranging from 1km to 2km in length. Structural steel design with deck sheeting and paver tiles.

projects.title: SVP Market
projects.description: Public market redevelopment (2725 sq. m.) including redesign of stalls, public toilets, and new walkways with daylight sky roof.

projects.title: The Erra
projects.description: High-rise residential complex (90,295 sq. m.) involving residential units, commercial shops, parking podium, and clubhouse.

projects.title: Windsor Residency
projects.description: High-rise residential complex (9000 sq. m.) with podium parking, clubhouse, and recreational areas.

projects.title: Villa California
projects.description: Township project (25 acres) featuring individual villas with swimming pools and public amenities.

projects.title: Orion CHS
projects.description: 1st Tallest Building in Self Redevelopment (MHADA). High-rise complex with podium amenities.

projects.title: DLH Square
projects.description: Redevelopment of high-rise residential complex (1200 sq. m.). Completed successfully.
